eu.mf2c.security.ac.tcp

Class ReqHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • eu.mf2c.security.ac.tcp.ReqHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ReqHandler
extends Thread
    Request handler for servicing a client call.

    author Shirley Crompton email shirley.crompton@stfc.ac.uk org Data Science and Technology Group, UKRI Science and Technology Council Created 29 Mar 2019

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run method for this handler thread. It processes the incoming message, gets the correct type of token created and sends it back to the client.

        If there are exceptions, an error code is returned:

        • err1 : integrity error for JWS and JWE
        • err2 : credential error for JWS and JWE
        • err3 : other processing errors
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class Thread

      • readToken

        public String readToken()
                 throws MsgTokenReaderException,
                        ReqHandlerException
        Parse a token String to get the plaintext payload.

        Returns:
        the plaintext payload
        Throws:
        MsgTokenReaderException - on error extracting the payload
        ReqHandlerException - on errors

      • buildToken

        public String buildToken()
                  throws ReqHandlerException,
                         MsgTokenBuilderException,
                         org.jose4j.lang.JoseException
        Build a token using the passed in arguments

        Returns:
        the token String
        Throws:
        ReqHandlerException - on error processing the request
        MsgTokenBuilderException - on error building the token
        org.jose4j.lang.JoseException - on error extracting the request arguments

      • handleRequest

        public String handleRequest(String message)
                     throws ReqHandlerException,
                            MsgTokenBuilderException,
                            MsgTokenReaderException,
                            org.jose4j.lang.JoseException
        Determine if caller is request a token or to get the payload.

        Parameters:
        message - the client request
        Returns:
        either a token String or the token payload.
        Throws:
        ReqHandlerException - on error processing the request
        MsgTokenReaderException - on error extracting the plaintext payload
        MsgTokenBuilderException - on error building the token
        org.jose4j.lang.JoseException - on error parsing the Json message String
